thread.title: Toronto FC's Sebastian Giovinco limps off after foul from Oguchi Onyewu
thread.title_full: Toronto FC's Sebastian Giovinco limps off after foul from Oguchi Onyewu

author: ESPN staff
title: Toronto FC's Sebastian Giovinco limps off after foul from Oguchi Onyewu
text:
Toronto FC's Sebastian Giovinco limps off after foul from Oguchi Onyewu Sebastian Giovinco had to leave Toronto's game in the first half. 
Toronto FC star Sebastian Giovinco left Saturday's game against the Philadelphia Union after picking up an injury just before half-time. 
Giovinco went down under a hard challenge from Union defender Oguchi Onyewu in the 44th minute. Subscribe to MLS LIVE today! 
- MLS LIVE is back with an all-new platform for 2017 - Get the most matches ever, LIVE and ON DEMAND - Packages start at only $14.99 a month - Watch MLS on your phone, computer or TV - Subscribe today at live.mlssoccer.com 
He had to be helped off the pitch after receiving treatment. 
But before Tosaint Ricketts could even come on in his place, Jozy Altidore drew and converted a penalty to bring Toronto level at 1-1. 
Follow @ESPNFC on Twitter to keep up with the latest football updates.
